private class StreamedMailParser.ParserThread
extends StoppableThread

This thread do the parsing job for a messages bulk.

process

public void process(java.util.ArrayList<StreamedSmtpMessage> bulk)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    javax.mail.MessagingException
Parse a messages bulk. Build a MailSet and push it to the MailManager. Attachments are reassembled and saved to a file. The message body is saved in the MailSet message. Too small or too large messages are set to be forwarded. If specified in lightattachment.xml, base64 encoded attachment are decoded.

Parameters:
bulk - the bulk to parse.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
javax.mail.MessagingException

forward

public void forward(java.util.ArrayList<StreamedSmtpMessage> bulk)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    javax.mail.MessagingException
Set a messages bulk to be forwarded.

Parameters:
bulk - the bulk to forward
Throws:
java.io.IOException
javax.mail.MessagingException
